name: Pachinko Monogatari: Pachi-Slot mo Aru deyo!!
overview: Pachinko Monogatari: Pachi-Slot mo Aru Deyo!! is a pachinko game that has the player travel a tower, taking part in pachinko games on various floors. Other floors contain facilities like a bank (for saving the game) and a live band (for listening to the game's soundtrack). Pachi-Slot mo Aru Deyo!! was developed by KAZe, who would also go on to make many more pachinko simulators for the Super Famicom. It was followed by Pachinko Monogatari 2: Nagoya Shachihoko no Teiou in 1995.
